name: binoculars-vscode
description: Binoculars scoring, contribution colorization, and rewrite workflow inside VS Code.

binoculars.backend.pythonPath.description: Python executable used to launch the persistent Binoculars bridge backend.

binoculars.configPath.description: Path to Binoculars model scoring config JSON.

binoculars.textMaxTokensOverride.description: Optional override for text.max_tokens used by the bridge.

binoculars.topK.description: Top-k size used for hotspot diagnostics in optional bridge calls.

binoculars.models.observerGgufPath.description: Optional override observer model path (GGUF). If set, your scoring config should reference it.

binoculars.models.performerGgufPath.description: Optional override performer model path (GGUF). If set, your scoring config should reference it.

binoculars.externalLlm.enabled.description: Whether rewrite generation may use external OpenAI-compatible LLM when configured in config.binoculars.llm.json.

binoculars.externalLlm.endpoint.description: Optional endpoint URL for OpenAI-compatible rewrite model.

binoculars.externalLlm.model.description: Optional model name for external rewrite LLM.

binoculars.externalLlm.temperature.description: Optional external rewrite LLM temperature override.

binoculars.externalLlm.maxTokens.description: Optional external rewrite LLM max_tokens override.

binoculars.render.contributionBars.description: Render per-line contribution bars in editor gutter.

binoculars.render.colorizeText.description: Render LOW/HIGH contribution colorization overlays in editor text.
